tour.welcome: Hi there! üòä Happy to welcome you. This is a short guide on how you can use this app üìö
tour.calculate: Here you can calculate your daily norm of water consumption according to your personal data üíßüìä
tour.add: To add a water portion, simply click the button below, choose the amount of water, and the time when you want to drink it ü•§‚è∞
tour.percentage: Here you can see the percentage of your daily need üìäüí¶
tour.calendar: In the calendar, you can see information about water consumption. Just click on the day you need to check if you've fulfilled your daily norm üìÖüíß
tour.stats: In this section, you can see all the water consumption statistics for any month üòäüö∞
tour.setting: In settings, you can easily configure your account by adding more information üõ†Ô∏èüíª
